reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: FY-2020 ILEA FUEL OBLIGATION. FY 2020 19-67-1022J VAT OBLIGATION. ILLEGAL LOGGING & FOREST CRIMES: 12-16 AUG 2019. LEADERSHIP FOR WOMEN IN LAW ENFORCEMENT TRANSLATIO. Value Added Taxes (VAT). AIR INTERDICTION (NARCOTICS): TRANSLATION 13-17 MA. ANTI-CORRUPTION & PUBLIC CORRUPTION-TRANSLATION. Special Contracts for Research, Development and Others - Contractual Translation and Interpreting Services. FY 2019 TRAINING SUPPLIES. FY 2019 19-67-1022J VAT OBLIGATION. FY 2020 ILEA-BOTSWANA GOVERNMENT CAPITAL CONTRIBUT. WILDLIFE TRAFFICKING INVESTIGATION 29 JUL-9 AUG 19. FINANCIAL INVESTIGATION LEADERSHIP 21-25 OCT 19 OP. MAR, APR & MAY 2019 ILEA OUTSTANDING MASCOM BILLS. REGIONAL ADVANCED NARCOTICS 9-13 SEP 2019: TRANSLA. EXECUTIVE FORUM ON COMMUNITY POLICING & CRISIS LEA. HUMAN TRAFFICKING/CHILD EXPLOITATION 21-26 JAN TRN. INTERNATIONAL POST BLAST INVESTIGATIONS 10-21 JUN. HUMAN TRAFFICKING/CHILD EXPLOITATION-TRANSLATION. ILLEGAL LOGGING & TIMBER HARVESTING: TRANSLATION. FY 2020 ILEA STAFF FOB RSA TOKENS OBLIGATION. ADVANCED NARCOTICS INVESTIGATIONS: TRANSLATION. CRIME SCENE MANAGEMENT & FORENSICS 24-28 JUN 19. FY 2018 ILEA VAT OBLIGATION. FY-2021 Information RedactedFOB OBLIGATION. LEADERSHIP FOR LAW ENFORCEMENT SUPERVISOR-TRANSLAT

description.narrative: This award strives to help foreign partners professionalize their military forces through educational programs and technical support, ensuring that their force can develop and maintain the requisite capacity to effectively carry out its military mission through reliance on discipline, accountability, effective professional standards, and technical expertise. More specifically, this includes FY-2020 ILEA FUEL OBLIGATION [Covers costs of automotive fuels and lubricants, including diesel oil, crankcase oil, gasoline, greases, etc.]. FY 2020 19-67-1022J VAT OBLIGATION [Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries. .]. ILLEGAL LOGGING & FOREST CRIMES: 12-16 AUG 2019 TRANSLATION[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. LEADERSHIP FOR WOMEN IN LAW ENFORCEMENT TRANSLATION: 11-15 FEB 2019[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries.. Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.. FY 2019 TRAINING SUPPLIES[Covers the costs of office supplies, stationary, forms, paper, other supplies, and minor equipment items.]. FY 2019 19-67-1022J VAT OBLIGATION [Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries. .]. FY 2020 ILEA-BOTSWANA GOVERNMENT CAPITAL CONTRIBUTION [Covers miscellaneous contractual services not otherwise classified.]. FINANCIAL INVESTIGATION LEADERSHIP 21-25 OCT 19 COURSE OPERATIONAL COSTS [Covers the costs of all contracts for training and conferences for staff, volunteers, and trainees only when the contract covers more than space rentals. See Object Class Code 2377 for space rentals. Includes post language training by FSI, contractual costs of language, cultural orientation, technical and other training for attaches and other employees. Tuition for the general education of employees (e.g., for courses; for credit leading to college or post graduate degrees).]. WILDLIFE TRAFFICKING INVESTIGATION 29 JUL-9 AUG 19: TRANSLATION [Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. Covers the costs of all contracts for training and conferences for staff, volunteers, and trainees only when the contract covers more than space rentals. See Object Class Code 2377 for space rentals. Includes post language training by FSI, contractual costs of language, cultural orientation, technical and other training for attaches and other employees. Tuition for the general education of employees (e.g., for courses; for credit leading to college or post graduate degrees).. OBLIGATION FOR MAR, APR & MAY 2019 ILEA OUTSTANDING MASCOM BILLS [Covers the costs for local and long distance calls based on a rate-per-call basis or on the number of minutes of use under the FTS system.]. ANTI-CORRUPTION & PUBLIC CORRUPTION-TRANSLATION: 20-24 MAY 2019[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. Award Description - EXECUTIVE FORUM ON COMMUNITY POLICING & CRISIS LEADERSHIP 4-15 FEB 2019. HUMAN TRAFFICKING/CHILD EXPLOITATION 21-26 JAN 2019: TRANSLATION[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. INTERNATIONAL POST BLAST INVESTIGATIONS 10-21 JUN 2019: TRANSLATION [Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. FY 2019 19-67-1022J VAT OBLIGATION[Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries.]. FY 2020 ILEA STAFF FOB RSA TOKENS OBLIGATION [Covers the costs of hardware or software, or equipment or interconnected system or subsystem of equipment that is used in the movement, control, display, switching, interchange, transmission, or reception of data or information.]. Award Description - ADVANCED NARCOTICS INVESTIGATIONS: TRANSLATION- 26 FEB - MAR 1 2019 (FRENCH). WILDLIFE TRAFFICKING INVESTIGATION 29 JUL-9 AUG 19: TRANSLATION[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. REGIONAL ADVANCED NARCOTICS 9-13 SEP 2019: TRANSLATION [Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. AIR INTERDICTION (NARCOTICS): TRANSLATION 13-17 MAY 2019 (FRENCH)[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. FY-2021 Information RedactedFOB OBLIGATION [Covers rental and maintenance costs of computer software and related systems as well as the cost for the necessary infrastructure (i.e., servers. contractor staff, help desk, etc.) that allows Department of State employees to telework.]. LEADERSHIP FOR LAW ENFORCEMENT SUPERVISOR-TRANSLATION: 18-22 MAR 2019[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. OBLIGATION FOR MAR, APR & MAY 2019 ILEA OUTSTANDING MASCOM BILLS [Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries. .]. CRIME SCENE MANAGEMENT & FORENSICS 24-28 JUN 2019: TRANSLATIONS[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. HUMAN TRAFFICKING/CHILD EXPLOITATION-TRANSLATION 10-14 JUNE 2019[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. FY 2018 ILEA VAT OBLIGATION [Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries. .]. INTERNATIONAL POST BLAST INVESTIGATIONS 10-21 JUN 2019: TRANSLATION[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.].

Through educational programs and technical support, help foreign partners professionalize their military forces, ensuring that their force can develop and maintain the requisite capacity to effectively carry out its military mission through reliance on discipline, accountability, effective professional standards, and technical expertise. In addition, activities assist foreign partners so that their military forces reliably demonstrate consistent support for adherence to norms of human rights; support the concept of civilian executive authority/control of the military; and have the capacity for institutional and security sector reform.

participating-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

participating-org.usg:office-name: Bureau of International Narcotics and Law Enforcement Affairs

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: Botswana is one of the United States' strongest allies in Africa and offers a powerful model to the region and world of a stable, democratic African nation. However, while attempting to meet the pressing need to diversify its diamond-dependent economy, Botswana continues to struggle to address one of the world's highest rates of income inequality and the second highest HIV prevalence rate in the world. U.S. assistance supports management of the HIV/AIDS epidemic, including the epidemic's broader impact on women and vulnerable citizens. U.S. assistance also seeks to build a more robust military-to-military partnership with Botswana while encouraging its support for regional security.

sector.narrative: Security system management and reform
